words.definition: to love; affection; to be fond of; to like

origin; source; roots or stems of plants; this; the current; root; foundation; basis; classifier for books, periodicals, files etc; originally
you're welcome; it's my pleasure (answer to someone who thanks)
dish (type of food); vegetables; vegetable; cuisine; CL:盘[pan2] ,道[dao4]
to eat; to have one's meal; to eradicate; to destroy; to absorb; to suffer; to exhaust
big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest
of; structural particle: used before a noun, linking it to preceding possessive or descriptive attributive

a little; a bit; drop (of liquid); stain; spot; speck; jot; dot stroke (in Chinese characters); decimal point; point; mark (of degree or level); a place (with certain characteristics); iron bell; o’clock; some; (point) unit of measurement for type; to touch on briefly; to make clear; to light; to ignite; to kindle; period of time at night (24 minutes) (old); a drip; to dibble; classifier for small indeterminate quantities
all, both; entirely (due to) each; even; already
to read; to study; reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
I'm sorry; excuse me; pardon me; if you please; sorry? (please repeat); unworthy; to let down;
many; much; a lot of; numerous; multi-
happy; glad; willing (to do sth); in a cheerful mood
classifier for people or objects in general; individual; this; that; size
job; work; construction; task; CL:个[ge4] ,份[fen4] ,项[xiang4]
good; well; proper; good to; easy to; very; so; (suffix indicating completion or readiness)
day of a month; (suffix used after) name of a ship; (ordinal) number
and; together with; with; sum; union; peace; harmony; surname He
to go back; to turn around; to answer; to return; to circle; to revolve; Hui ethnic group; time; classifier for acts of a play; section or chapter (of a classic book)
can; be possible; be able to; will; be likely to; be sure to; to assemble; to meet; to gather; to see; union; group; association; a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is hui3)
how much; how many; several; a few

home; family; classifier for families or businesses; refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China; noun suffix for specialists in some activity such as musician or revolutionary, corresponds to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian; surname Jia; CL:个[ge4]
to call; to shout; to order; to ask; to be called; by (indicates agent in the passive mood)
to open; to start; to turn on; to operate (vehicle)
to see; to catch sight of
unit of currency; lump (of earth); chunk; piece; classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc; colloquial word for yuan (or other unit of currency such as Hong Kong or US dollar etc), usually as 块钱
to come; to arrive; to come round; ever since; next
(completed action marker); (modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
mum; mama; mommy; mother; CL:个[ge4] ,位[wei4]
haven't; hasn't; doesn't exist; to not have; to not be;
name (of a person or thing); CL:个[ge4]
which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier);
that; those; then (in that case); commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing;
to be able to; to be capable of; ability; capability; able; capable; can possibly; (usually used in the negative) to have the possibility of
to ask; to invite; please (do sth); to treat (to a meal etc); to request

to go; to go to (a place); to cause to go or send (sb); to remove; to get rid of; (when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth; to be apart from in space or time; (after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker); (used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation); (of a time or an event etc) just passed or elapsed
heat; to heat up; fervent; hot (of weather); warm up
to know; to recognize; to be familiar with; acquainted with sth; knowledge; understanding; awareness; cognition
time; length of time; moment; period
book; letter; CL:本[ben3] ,册[ce4] ,部[bu4]; see also Book of History
to go to bed; to go to sleep
to speak; to say; to explain; to scold; to tell off; a theory (usually in compounds such as 日心说 heliocentric theory);
classifier for years (of age); year; year (of crop harvests)
he or him; (used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant); (used before sb's name for emphasis); (used as a meaningless mock object); other; another
to listen; to hear; to obey; a can (loanword from English 'tin'); classifier for canned beverages
to like; to be fond of
down; downwards; below; lower; later; next (week etc); second (of two parts); to decline; to go down
Mister (Mr.); husband; doctor (topolect); teacher; CL:个[ge4] ,位[wei4]
now; at present; at the moment; modern; current; nowadays
to think; to believe; to suppose; to wish; to want; to miss
young lady; Miss; (slang) prostitute; CL:个[ge4] ,位[wei4]
one; 1; single; a (article); as soon as; entire; whole; all; throughout; 'one' radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)
to have; there is; there are; to exist; to be
(located) at; (to be) in; to exist; in the middle of doing sth; (indicating an action in progress)
how are things? how?; how about?; how was it?
this; these; (commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing);
to live; to dwell; to stay; to reside; to stop

to do; to make; to produce; to write; to compose; to act as; to engage in; to hold (a party); to be; to become; to function (in some capacity); to serve as; to be used for; to form (a bond or relationship); to pretend; to feign; to act a part; to put on appearance
to sit; to take a seat; to take (a bus, airplane etc); to bear fruit
